## Oracle type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Oracle<Q> = <I, T, A>(rule: Rule<I, T, Q>, question: {
    [K in keyof Q]: Question<K, Q[K], T, A>;
}[keyof Q]) => Future<Option<A>>;
```
